dcterms:creator: Y. Xia
L. Wu
Z. Wang
X. Zheng
J. Jin
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is used for simulating vehicle movement models and communication scenarios between vehicles and infrastructure, providing a rich set of data for training and testing algorithms in vehicular networks.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: E. Ahmed
H. Gharavi
dcterms:description: The NuScenes dataset includes 1000 driving scenes in urban environments, providing diverse data for training and testing algorithms related to vehicular networks and enhancing the understanding of complex traffic situations.
dcterms:title: NuScenes
